casebody.data:
THE HACKENSACK. THE TRITON. PENNSYLVANIA COAL CO. v. POTTER TRANSP. CO., Inc. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 16, 1923.) No. 263. Park & Mattison, of New York City (Anthony V. Lynch, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Bigham, Englar & Jones, of New York City (Leonard J. Matteson and' Andrew J. McElhinney, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
